title: Coronation Street fans baffled as Gemma appears to give birth with her leggings on
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Coronation Street viewers were a bit baffled this evening as Gemma Winter appeared to give birth to one of her quadruplets - while wearing her leggings.

In true Gemma and Chesney fashion, they were stuck in a broken down cable car and lost her engagement ring as she went into labour.

Thankfully, despite the panic, Gemma managed to give birth to a healthy baby boy.

But fans were left raising their eyebrows after becoming convinced that Gemma still had her leggings on.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

One tweeted: "Is Gemma wearing leggings or a skirt? Because if it’s the former, she’s doing a “Daphne from Neighbours” in not pulling them down first before giving birth #Corrie."

While another wrote: "Has Gemma still got her leggings on? #Corrie."

A third remarked: "How can we see what’s happeningif Gemma still has her frickin leggings on #Corrie."

Meanwhile others were in hysterics over the scenes.

One tweeted: "I can't believe Gemma actually gave birth to one of the quads on the cable car #Corrie."

Another wrote: "I absolutely love Gemma saying that she wants to push Chesney over the side of the cable car! #llandudno #coronationstreet #Corrie @itvcorrie."

*Coronation Street returns tomorrow at 8pm on ITV
description: Gemma Winter gave birth to her first baby in the air on a cable car this evening on Corrie
